I'm think more about the circumstances where clans were abolished and 
members were invited to take the tonsure or commit seppuku. Of course 
this might not be considered retirement ;) Certainly not what the first 
poster was thinking of. Normally this was a favored way to take power 
behind the scenes by a fair number of people.

Jim Eckman
